Why Subscribe To THE WEEK ?

Unmatched Weekly Insights

Receive THE WEEK magazine every week, delivering in-depth news, analysis, and stories from India’s top journalists.

Special Editions & Exclusive Content

Enjoy anniversary editions, deep-dives, and exclusive features available only to subscribers.

Full Digital Access

Get unlimited access to THE WEEK Manorama Digital Archive, including past issues and special reports.

Iconic Visuals & Photo Essays

Access a rich archive of iconic images, photo essays, and visual storytelling that bring the news to life.

Priority Access To Events

Invitations and priority booking for THE WEEK Manorama sponsored events, talks, and literary gatherings.

Exclusive Newsletters & Insights

Receive curated newsletters with expert analysis from THE WEEK’s editorial team.
